Be a seafood hero and give your family what they really crave… premium seafood. Get A Gift Card Earn Rewards! Download the My Captain D’s app and receive 1 point for every dollar you spend. Rack up points and Redeem points for your favorite items at D’s including fan favorites like Mozzarella sticks and Giant Fish Sandwiches. Points only valid for online/in-app orders. Get the App! About Us Captain D's, Charleston At our Charleston, SC location, we are part of a historic seafood tradition. Captain D's Seafood Restaurant first opened its doors back on August 15, 1969. A lot has changed since then, but our commitment to serving freshly prepared seafood at a great value has been our core mission from the beginning. Known originally as Mr. D's Seafood and Hamburgers, Captain D's was opened in Donelson, Tennessee. From the very start, we set out to provide quality seafood at reasonable prices, a concept that was revolutionary at the time. Start Earning with Captain D's Rewards Get Points with every App order. Redeem towards menu items. Exclusive members-only surprises and deals. More points means more rewards. Download the My Captain D’s app and receive 1 point for every dollar you spend. Rack up points and Redeem points for your favorite items at D’s including fan favorites like Mozzarella sticks and Giant Fish Sandwiches. Points only valid for online/in-app orders. About Us Captain D's, Charleston At our Charleston, SC location, we are part of a historic seafood tradition. Captain D's Seafood Restaurant first opened its doors back on August 15, 1969. A lot has changed since then, but our commitment to serving freshly prepared seafood at a great value has been our core mission from the beginning. Known originally as Mr. D's Seafood and Hamburgers, Captain D's was opened in Donelson, Tennessee. From the very start, we set out to provide quality seafood at reasonable prices, a concept that was revolutionary at the time. Start Earning with Captain D's Rewards Get Points with every App order.
